facts.1: National Meteor Watch Day is celebrated on June 30th to encourage people to observe meteors.
facts.2: Meteors are often referred to as shooting stars.
facts.3: The best time to watch meteors is during a meteor shower, which occurs when Earth passes through the debris left by a comet.

facts.1: Social Media Day was launched by Mashable on June 30, 2010.
facts.2: The day recognizes the impact of social media on global communication.
facts.3: Social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram have millions of users worldwide.

facts.1: Ice cream soda, also known as a float, is a beverage that combines ice cream with soda.
facts.2: The drink was invented in the late 19th century.
facts.3: Popular variations include the root beer float and the Coke float.
